item.title: By: rachelfrank
item.dc:creator: rachelfrank
item.description: I just read a glowing review about this songwriter Fernando Viciconte in the new Magnet, so I downloaded his new album Enter to Exit from itunes,and let me tell you....It's amazing! If you are a fan of beatles, Harry Nilsson, Posies, etc.. you would love this album. Has anyone heard of this guy before? I've been a fan of pop music for years and I never had until three days ago. Per the review this is his fifth album, so I am stunned that I am not familiar with his music. I think he is from Portland, Oregon or L.A., does anyone know if he is touring?
item.content:encoded: I just read a glowing review about this songwriter Fernando Viciconte in the new Magnet, so I downloaded his new album Enter to Exit from itunes,and let me tell you….It’s amazing! If you are a fan of beatles, Harry Nilsson, Posies, etc.. you would love this album. Has anyone heard of this guy before? I’ve been a fan of pop music for years and I never had until three days ago. Per the review this is his fifth album, so I am stunned that I am not familiar with his music. I think he is from Portland, Oregon or L.A., does anyone know if he is touring?
